data.actual_result: The ping comes back and gets stuck: impossible to get rid of it, even when marking as read again, until you view it on Desktop or someone posts a new message in the channel.
data.short_description: When an @ everyone tag is sent in a very large server (5+digit member count), all Android users that have read the ping and closed Discord before the push notification has propagated will get a stuck ping
data.steps_to_repro: - Receive an @ everyone from a very large server (like at least 20k members) - As soon as the everyone message is sent, mark channel as read and close Discord - Wait for a few seconds to a few minutes until you get the push notification - Click the push notification or simply reopen Discord
